channel.title: Blogflop
channel.description: A place for my random ramblings of rambledom.

item.title: Statement of Intent
item.description:
My main purpose in having this blog is to share my small projects with the world.

Facebook and Reddit posts both tend to fall into the abyss along with all the unimportant stuff, and I really want a spot where I can come back to things Iâ€™ve written later.

So here it is. If you find my opinions interesting, please feel free to subscribe to my newsletter.
